title: A new way of developing
content: Handlebars is a templating engine that allows you to dynamically add data from a database to a web page

title: JavaScript
content: JavaScript is an extremely powerful programming language that can be used both on the front end and the back end of web pages.

title: CSS frameworks
content: CSS frameworks such as Bootstrap, Materialize, and Foundation can be used to quickly format the layout of your UI.

title: ORMs
content: Sequelize is an ORM(object relational mapping) that allows you to make database queries with ease as a JavaScript developer.
